ComicInfo.Summary:
IT'S NOT THE END... HE'S UNSTOPPABLE!
The JUGGERNAUT just keeps barreling down the path of righteousness - right into the hands of some very dangerous people. But the question is: for all his personal growth...can Cain Marko save anyone but himself?
ComicInfo.Tags: The Human Adaptoid,The Unstoppables,Primus,D-Cel,Arnim Zola,New Mexico,North Dakota,Black Tom Cassidy,Quicksand,Pacific Ocean,Professor X,Juggernaut,Krakoa
ComicInfo.Title: A New Beginning? (Except Not With the Nazi Scientist.)
